Visualize the Starbucks locations and their amenities.
1. Scrapy for store locators
2. Leaflet for visualization
3. ML clustering for grouping the stores based on amenities
4. Map layer for citibikeanallysis app

```{r}
#Load data rendered by Scrapy
library(tidyverse)
df_sb <- read.csv('./starbucks/StarbucksStores.txt', stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
View(df_sb)
head(df_sb)
```
